page.title: 18 GOG MAGOG GOLF COURSE 1
page.content: There is a 9 hole practice course and an 18 hole course for advanced golfers. The ground staff comprises a head green-keeper, 35 yrs service, his deputy in charge of machinery who both live on the course and enjoy playing golf; plus 4 others. They work an 8 hr day plus overtime when preparing for matches.They are responsible for the 270 acre area including 36 acres of fairway.The 5 acres of green are cut once each day except Sunday with 3 large tractor mowers which cut very finely at 400 cuts per yd. It takes 4 hours to mow 27 greens.A mechanical rake is used to break up and rake the sand in the bunkers. This does the work which once took 6 men 1 day. The completely automatic watering system is controlled by 1 master switch. Each green has 5 pop_up sprinklers.
